column4: There's no pulsaudio in Kubuntu? Those guys are smarter than I thought...
Yes, it seems so... It would be better to use the same server in every fork not to get angry people like me, who hate using dumb apps like dragon, which can do nothing
I guess. But pulseaudio is a nightmare and you're better off without it...
Maybe, but I can't play any sound in my VLC, even if switching sound server from one to another...
